description: The Application Period for 2023-2024 intake is 15th November 2022- 8th June 2023. Apply Now!
fees: - EU and non-EU students regularly residing in Italy: 156 - 4000 euro per year, determined by students’ family income.  - Non-Eu students with a valid study VISA: flat rate, set on the basis of the Country of citizenship and the field of study. The flat rate ranges from 400 EUR to 4500 EUR per year.
